content.body: Is it possible to tell from a Fetch request whether the request was initiated by the parser or by script execution?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Is it possible to tell from a Fetch request whether the request was initiated by the parser or by script execution?

content.body: (other things initiating the request are of course possible, but the question is about the difference between `` and `img=document.createElement("img"); img.src = "foo"; document.body.appendChlld(img)`)
